item.title: about
item.description: I’ve been 10 years in IT sector with technical background and service in mind. My strengths are: GNU/Linux, Cloud Computing and Internet of Things. I like to explore the newest technology innovations like Deep Learning and Big Data.

item.title: Linux Foundation LFCE certification
item.description: Obtained Linux Foundation LFCE (Linux Foundation Certified Engineer) certification! Linux Foundation_LFCE_certificate.pdf (passed on 3th December 2017) The Linux Foundation is the foundation that support the development of Linux and others Open Source initiatives worldwide. The Linux creator “Linus Torvalds“ works under its umbrella and hosts kernel.org website. A LFCE (Linux Foundation Certified Engineer) certified engineer possesses in depth skills of Linux system and is responsible for the design and implementation of system architecture.
